title: Johnston Family Acupuncture - Chinese Medicine is so much more than just acupuncture. That's why we discuss lifestyle changes with each one of our patients. - You know what your body needs: good exercise , nutrition, sleep  and activities that make you calm  and happy ! When those are out of whack our patients come in for a tune-up. - Many of our patients have also built acupuncture into their wellness routine as well.  . . . #chinesemedicine #acupuncture #stress #insomnia #neckpain #backpain #kneepain #fertility #pregnancy #postpartum | Facebook
